name: The Battle of Red Blossoms
description:
There was a man in old Japan
By the name of Sen Mitsuya
Unlike most Samurai, he fought with lies
And used dirty tricks to fool ya

In our game's lore, he washed ashore
Near the Tourney of Red Blossoms
He signed to the lists, but soon got the gist
That his results would be less than awesome.

But with a keen eye, Sen might not die
Cause he's got some tricks up his sleeve
Through puzzles and fights, and some flashing lights,
He might find a way to leave!

Team:
Jonathan Moormann - Narrative
Jose Tomas Vicuna - Visuals
Wyatt Yeong - Programming
